content: this dishcloth measures 8 x 8 this dishcloth pattern is one of my very favorite knitting patterns i used it as one of the five stitch patterns for my nephew eric s scarf eric chose gray and this pattern looks simply amazing in the rich gray tones of the scarf eric s finished scarf can be seen here 1 i created a video tutorial showing the novice knitter how to work the herringbone linen stitch repeat that link is included in the pattern ♥as are all my knitting patterns this pattern has been test knit twice and both copy and tech edited for accuracy ©2019 laws of knitting enjoy joan 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/chevron-scarf-42
